Author: cipi#4502
Content: @tolken being bob doesn't affect your ability to submit alice buy/sells, but doing the buy/sells will change the price of your bob bids/asks (autoprice), till the autoprice is updated agaian... that was my experience last i did that on a bob... but i use "dedicated" alice/bobs since some time and didn't tried it again

Author: tolken#2655
Content: Interesting, great to know. I was wondering why it was mentioning autoprice when I was doing Alice buys. That said, it could be coincidence but on many occasions I have a trouble matching an alice Buy, but then I start mm without my autoprice set and the buy then goes through. Was so consistent I just assumed that was by design.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: I will say more likely sometimes to make a fresh installation

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: is better than having to upgrade your OS

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Barterdex is portable but still the Barterdex folder is created in Appdata....sometimes erasing that folder and launching Barterdex again can solve that issue, But bewarned only to do this if you don't have any pending or stuck swap ...because your swap file is in that folder I just mentioned.

Author: MarcM9000#8247
Content:
i‚Äôm on mac os. so no AppData. i deleted barterdex in library application support and rebooted.
 but on start is still sits on wait forever. is there another folder or file to delete on mac? What do you mean fresh installation?

Author: Nabob#5004
Content:
before you delete barterdex folder have you checked no marketmaker instance running in background
check with this
`ps -ef | grep marketmaker`

if it is, kill that process

Author: MarcM9000#8247
Content: yes. i killed it. and then rebooted. still hangs.  at this point 1.1.1 and 1.1.2 do the same thing. even if i delete barterdex. another idea?

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: have you already deleted/moved the BarterDEX data directory ?

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
linux: ~/.BarterDEX
mac: ~/Library/Applications Support/BarterDEX
win: %AppData%\BarterDEX

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: these are not the applications. these are the data directory.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
close BarterDEX
make sure `marketmaker` is not running in background. kill it with taskmanager/monitor if required
Move or delete barterdex data directory
start barterdex app
it should start.
if doesn't either the bundled marketmaker is not good or there is some other process like antivirus is causing it to not start for system security etc.

Author: Nabob#5004
Content: @MarcM9000 provide screenshot on which point it hangs?

Author: cipi#4502
Content:
@tolken the reason why bob couldn't send bobpayment is not contained in the log message
```swapdata rawtx has null txbytes
error from basilisk_swapdata_rawtx.bobpayment 0x103a3d8cc len.0
error sending bobpayment```
there should be some other output...
such swaps should be rewinded automatically after couple of hours (4-12) and you can try to speed it up by calling `swapstatus` manually
